title: Scope and Shadowing
description: In this lab, we learn about variable bindings, their scope, and the concept of shadowing in Rust. Variable bindings are confined to a block, which is a collection of statements enclosed by braces. There are two examples provided to illustrate these concepts. The first example shows how a variable binding declared inside a block is limited to that block's scope and is not accessible outside of it. The second example demonstrates variable shadowing, where a new binding with the same name is declared inside a block, effectively shadowing the outer binding.

meta.title: Mastering Variable Scope and Shadowing in Rust
meta.description: Explore the concepts of variable bindings, scope, and shadowing in Rust programming language.
meta.keywords: rust playground, rust online playground, rust tutor, rust online compiler, scope, rust commands, variable bindings, shadowing, rust practice, rust online
